name: TUMU CAT - Easy 3 match puzzle!
description:
This is easy 3 match puzzle game collected and connected!
You collect and connect lovely cats and erase cats.
Let's try erasing many cats in 60 seconds!

[Rule]
- If three or more cats are connected, you erase a cat and can acquire a score.
- You can gain a high score more, if a cat is connected for a long time.
- You can get "BIG CAT", if 5 cats can be connected.
- "BIG CAT" has a score 4 times.
- You can get a "CAT BALL", if 7 cats can be connected further.
- A "CAT BALL" is a special ball which disappears only by one.
- If you do the tap of the "CAT BALL", the same kind of cat disappears at a stretch, and you can gain a high score further.
